name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Highly skilled Senior DevOps Engineer with 8 years of extensive experience in SRE and DevOps practices, specializing in CI/CD automation and infrastructure management. Proficient in **AWS**, **Azure**, **Kubernetes**, and **OpenStack** for deploying and managing robust applications across cloud platforms. Extensive experience with **Linux**, **Ansible**, **Chef**, and **Jenkins** for automating deployment pipelines and configuration management. Strong capabilities in networking practices and source code management utilizing **Git** and **Artifactory**. Versatile programming expertise in **Python**, and experience with **Golang**, **Ruby**, and **Scala** to enhance development workflows and application performance.

Additionally, my background in full-stack development enables me to collaborate effectively with both development teams and operations. I possess profound knowledge in **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and **Django**, facilitating seamless integration of applications. Experienced in ensuring compliance with industry standards, I advocate for secure and efficient operational practices while delivering high-performance solutions tailored to healthcare and financial sectors.
